name: cmdftp
short_description: cmdftp is a command line FTP client for Unix systems that features shell-like functions, passive mode, local and remote transparent modes, broken connection resumption, multiple and recursive file transfers, auto-login, and large file support.

screenshots.caption: editing remote and local files using the 'e' command
using remote cp command to copy a whole dir to a subdir
p command prints a local or remote text file
